strapiPost.title: The Symphony of Northwest Arkansas Announces Virtual Holiday Performances
strapiPost.content:
SoNa has announced a series of virtual holiday events and a new collaboration with Ballet Arkansas.

  • The collaboration is part of a larger cultural conversation and an attempt to bring Central and Northwest Arkansas closer together, says D. Riley Nicholson, Executive Director of SoNA. -Fayetteville Flyer
  • 'Sleighride Together' will be released Dec. 21 and features a full SoNa orchestra and ballet performances.
  • More information on upcoming SoNa performances HERE.
